message: I have a high-quality product for sale for $10000. I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount if you buy it now, but if you decline, the price will remain the same for the next product. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product at $9000.

I have a product for sale for $10000. I know you just got a great deal on the previous one, but I want to assure you that this one is not the same as the previous one. I'm willing to offer you a 5% discount if you buy it now, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. What do you say?
I'll pass on this one.

I've had a chance to think about the previous product, and I realize that I may have been too generous with the discount. I'm sticking to the original price of $10000 for this one. If you're interested, I'll throw in a free inspection report that will give you a detailed analysis of the product's features and quality. What do you say?
I'll take the product with the free inspection report.

I'm glad you're open to considering the inspection report! For this next product, I'll offer you a unique opportunity. I'll give you the inspection report for free, and I'll also give you a 10% discount on the price. However, I want to warn you that this product is a rare find, and I'm not sure how long I'll be able to offer it at this price. What do you say?
I'll pass on this opportunity.

Let me ask you a question: are you willing to consider a product that might not be as valuable as the previous high-quality one, but still has some utility and value? I'm willing to sell this product to you for $8000, which is a significant discount from the original price. What do you say?
I'll take the product at $8000.

I'll also include a bonus - I'll give you a voucher for a free product in a future round, which you can redeem when you're ready. What do you say?
I'll pass on this offer.

For this next product, I'll offer you a unique deal - I'll give you the opportunity to buy it for $5000, but I'll also give you the option to return it within 2 rounds if you're not satisfied with its quality. What do you say?
I'll take the product at $5000 with the satisfaction guarantee.
